properties.address: The Reading Rooms,, HOLBEACH, SPALDING, Lincolnshire PE12 7LL
properties.description: Mainly the elderly although we also support people with mental health and other issues, also providing food for anyone struggling to feed themselves or their family Come in and enjoy a tea or coffee whilst enjoying the warmth from 10.30 a.m. every Friday, making new friends, with a two-course home-cooked meal served at 12:00
properties.title: Reading Rooms, Holbeach

properties.address: 69 Chapelgate,, Sutton St James, Lincolnshire PE12 0EF
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits you at Sutton St James Baptist Church, pop in for a chat and a cuppa, a biscuit or sometimes we have homemade cake! Tackle a board game or some colouring or just enjoy making new friends. Everyone welcome.
properties.title: Sutton St James Baptist Church

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 14th December 2023** Through the winter many of us will struggle with the extortionate energy prices, so come and join us, keep warm and grab a bite to eat. Use this space to connect with others, play games, sit quietly and read a book what ever it may be, know this is a safe warm space. We will be using the Garden room at the community centre in Walpole St Andrew. It has a main room and a conservatory that then leads out to the garden. WE ARE CLOSED ON THE 3RD THURSDAY OF THE MONTH. ON THE WEEK WE ARE CLOSED ON THURSDAY WE WILL BE OPEN ON TUESDAY INSTEAD.
properties.title: The Wild Hub Winter Lounge

properties.address: 19 Church Road, KING'S LYNN, Norfolk PE34 4SJ
properties.description: Tilney All Saints Village Hall is regarded as one of only two community assets that Tilney All Saints has, the other being the primary school. The building was refurbished in 2017 including: eco-friendly air source heating system; new ceiling with LED lighting, vinyl flooring and fire-resistant doors; a disabled toilet together with baby changing facility; upvc double-glazed windows and new tables and chairs. In 2019, the car park was refurbished and in 2022 the kitchen upgraded and the main and fire doors updated. In 2024, we had the entire hall redecorated. And finally, we have solar panels installed (December 2024) to help with offsetting the ever increasing energy costs. The venue is a clean and warm up-to-date facility that is at the heart of the village. We will be providing hot and cold refreshments including, most people's favourite, bacon butties and all for free!!!
properties.title: Tilney All Saints Village Hall

properties.description: A welcoming cafe style room serving hot and cold drinks, and offering puzzles, games, arts and crafts etc. A great space to meet up with others.
properties.title: Tonic Health Holbeach Hub

properties.address: St. Matthews church, Spalding, Lincolnshire PE12 9SA
properties.description: A welcome group, with activities for children and a cooked meal and pudding for all those who attend.
